problem.p: How would you describe the level of school at which you teach? You may check more than one box.

choice.name: college_teacher
choice.text: I teach at a college or university.

choice.name: high_school_teacher
choice.text: I teach in high school or secondary school.

choice.name: grade_school_teacher
choice.text: I teach at middle, elementary, or grammar school.

choice.name: adult_teacher
choice.text: I teach adults who are returning to school.

choice.name: elsewhere_teacher
choice.text: I teach outside of traditional schools.
